description: Enterprise techniques used by Dust Storm, ATT&CK group G0031 v1.0
name: Dust Storm (G0031)

techniques.comment: [Dust Storm](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0031) has encoded payloads with a single-byte XOR, both skipping the key itself and zeroing in an attempt to avoid exposing the key.
[Dust Storm](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0031) has used Android backdoors capable of exfiltrating specific files directly from the infected devices.
[Dust Storm](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0031) has used Android backdoors capable of enumerating specific files on the infected devices.
